document.full_text: telecoms gear maker ericsson blasted past first-quarter core profit expectations thanks to surging mobile broadband sales but said it would take until the third quarter to resolve japan quake supply problems.
document.title: ericsson profit surges on mobile broadband demand
lines_and_colors: telecoms gear maker ericsson blasted past first-quarter core profit expectations thanks to surging mobile broadband sales but said it would take until the third quarter to resolve japan quake supply problems.
